members.name: The Old Town Bookshop
members.description: A historic bookstore offering rare and contemporary Scottish literature.

members.name: Edinbrugh Castle
members.description: Edinburgh Castle is one of the most exciting historic sites in Western Europe. Set in the heart of Scotland's dynamic capital city, it is sure to capture your imagination..

members.name: Scots Monument
members.description: Dedicated to Sir Walter Scott, it is one of the largest monuments to a writer anywhere in the world.

members.name: Mary's Close Edinburgh
members.description: Discover authentic truths about Edinburgh's dark past, and find out what it was really like for the people who lived, worked, and died on the Close.

members.name: Festival Theatre
members.description: Designed as Scotland's premier dance and opera house in 1994, the stage is the largest in Scotland.

members.name: Edinbrugh Art Museum
members.description: The National Galleries of Scotland consists of three galleries in the very heart of Edinburgh.

members.name: National Museum of Scotland
members.description: There is a great selection of Scottish history, natural history and touring exhibitions.

members.name: Edinbrugh Fringe Festival
members.description: For three weeks in August, Edinburgh welcomes an explosion of creative energy from around the globe.
